content: pattern elements written and graphic copyright megan williams 2013 please do not reproduce redistribute or sell the pattern see stockinette zombies designs for more patterns weather the weather hat - page 2 of 4 main hat storm front chart is the same as the main hat written directions set-up round *k1tbl k7* repeat to end of round storm front stitch pattern round 1 *sl1 p7* repeat to end of round round 2 *lt k6* repeat to end of round round 3 *p1 sl1 p6* repeat to end of round round 4 *k1 lt k5* repeat to end of round round 5 *p2 sl1 p5* repeat to end of round round 6 *k2 lt k4* repeat to end of round round 7 *p3 sl1 p4* repeat to end of round round 8 *k3 lt k3* repeat to end of round round 9 *p4 sl1 p3* repeat to end of round round 10 *k4 lt k2* repeat to end of round round 11 *p5 sl1 p2* repeat to end of round round 12 *k8* repeat to end of round round 13 *p5 sl1 p2* repeat to end of round round 14 *k4 rt k2* repeat to end of round round 15 *p4 sl1 p3* repeat to end of round round 16 *k3 rt k3* repeat to end of round round 17 *p3 sl1 p4* repeat to end of round round 18 *k2 rt k4* repeat to end of round round 19 *p2 sl1 p5* repeat to end of round round 20 *k1 rt k5* repeat to end of round round 21 *p1 sl1 p6* repeat to end of round round 22 *rt k6* repeat to end of round round 23 *sl1 p7* repeat to end of round round 24 *k8* repeat to end of round repeat rounds 1-24 until hat measures 6 6 5 7 7 inches from cast-on or 1 5 inches from desired length ending after completing round 11 or 23 all pattern elements written and graphic copyright megan williams 2013 please do not reproduce redistribute or sell the pattern see stockinette zombies designs for more patterns weather the weather hat - page 3 of 4 crown decreases chart is the same as the crown decreases after row 11 written directions decreases ending after row 11 round 1 *k4 k2tog k2* repeat to end of round there are now 63 70 77 84 total stitches round 2 *p4 sl1 p2* repeat to end of round round 3 *k7* repeat to end of round round 4 *p4 sl1 p2* repeat to end of round round 5 *k3 k2tog k2* repeat to end of round there are now 54 60 66 72 total stitches round 6 *p3 sl1 p2* repeat to end of round round 7 *k6* repeat to end of round round 8 *p3 sl1 p2* repeat to end of round round 9 *k2 k2tog k2* repeat to end of round there are now 45 50 55 60 total stitches round 10 *p2 sl1 p2* repeat to end of round round
